SETSUBUN 2013 Ogre Extermination!
Setsubun 2013, evil spirits that were sealed inside a bewitched sword have been unleashed and converted into ogres. Great Edo of Nippon is full of ogres! Come on, join the battle with an Iron Club to defeat the ogres!

Event time: January 30th, 2013 (after maintenance) to February 27th, 2013 (until the start of maintenance)

日式節分活動2013 - 擊退鬼怪
日式節分活動2013，封印在詛咒之刀的邪靈被解放出來，形成在日本大江戶徘徊的鬼怪了。來加入戰鬥，擊退鬼怪吧！

活動期間：2013年1月30日(系統維修後)至2013年2月27日(系統維修前)
On Valentine’s Day 2013, let's get together in the Southern Island Hideaway and try the "Valentine's Day Super Double Flight" with someone special!
為了慶祝2013年情人節，請至南島秘密樂園跟您心儀的人一同遊玩「情人節超級雙人飛行旅程」吧！
Happy Valentine's Day!\nAlready sent Valentine Gifts? Get the Machine and make your friends happy!
情人節快樂！\n已經送出您的情人節禮物了嗎？用這機器讓您的朋友高興吧！

ITEM.TEXT: 碼頭公園的情人節活動

DESCRIPTION.BODY: Romance is in the air this Valentine Week in PlayStation®Home. Head down to Pier Park and spend this year’s Valentine’s Day in the classy surroundings of the French Riviera.
情人節活動於這禮拜開始，PlayStation®Home也充滿著濃厚的浪漫氣氛。今年的情人節，不妨逛逛改造成蔚藍海岸風格的碼頭公園吧。

Shopping Mall – East updated!
2 fun mini games arrived at Shopping Mall – East.
<Oscar's Lobster Mania>
Roll up, roll up! Come and play “Oscar's Lobster Mania”. You can get 15 special prizes by completing all levels!
<Supa-Fun Robo-Goalie Time!!>
Enjoy a penalty shoot-out against the world’s greatest robot goalkeeper!
< Check out the new look of VEEMEE’s shop front!>
Check out what they have released recently too!

Shopping Mall - 東區已更新！
現在有兩個好玩的遊戲設立於Shopping Mall。
<奧斯卡的龍蝦狂>
來吧來吧！來玩「奧斯卡的龍蝦狂」吧！一共有15個特別獎品，完成所有關卡就能全數獲得！
<Supa-Fun Robo-Goalie Time!!>
跟世界上最厲害的機器人守門員PK吧！
<去看看VEEMEE商店的新裝潢吧>
順便看看他們有什麼新商品吧！
Check them out and find your favorite!\nAvailable now!
趕快確認並找出您最喜愛的商品吧！\n現在熱賣中!

Take a European vacation without ever leaving your living room!\nEnjoy a beautiful Parisian vista from the luxury Granzella’s penthouse situated in Paris' urban area.\nThe life in Paris, La Ville-Lumière, starts now, and Eiffel tower and Triumphal arch are yours.
您不用離開自己的客廳就可以去歐洲走一趟！\nGranzella的頂樓豪華公寓，讓您可以充足享受巴黎市中心的景觀！\n巴黎生活從現在開始！巴黎鐵塔和凱旋門都是您的！
Check them out and find your favorite!\nAvailable now!
趕快確認並找出您最喜愛的商品吧！\n現在熱賣中!
Happy Valentine's Day!\nCheck them out and find your favorite!
情人節快樂！\n趕快確認並找出您最喜愛的商品吧！

Happy Lunar New Year!
As a signature Lunar New Year Event, Lucky Set is out now! This year, PlayStation®Home offers you fantastic Lucky Set!
This year’s Lucky Set (4 of them) contains incredibly a lot of items which are all BRAND NEW! In addition, we offer them to you at very SPECIAL price!!
Each lucky set contains different color of “2013 Special New Year T-shirt” with this year’s oriental zodiac animal, Snake design.
Please browse the Navigator and pick out one for yourself!

恭賀新禧！
為慶祝農曆新年活動，現在已開始販賣福袋！今年PlayStation®Home也為您呈現精美的福袋組合包！
今年有四份福袋組合包，每份組合包都包含許多全新道具！此外，我們還為您提供特別價位！
每份福袋組合包都有包含不同顏色的「2013年賀歲T恤」，並附有今年的生肖 - 蛇 - 的圖案。
去移動導航器找找適合您的組合包吧！
Check them out and find your favorite!\nAvailable now!
趕快確認並找出您最喜愛的商品吧！\n現在熱賣中!

☆Introducing New Items of the Week☆

You can find the latest released item right here!
Check them out and find your favorite!
☆介紹本週新商品☆\n您可以在此確認最新推出的商品！\n趕快確認並找出您最喜愛的商品吧！
